text: Paradise (Spanish: Paraíso) is a 2013 Mexican romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Mariana Chenillo. It is based on the novel by Julieta Arévalo. It stars Andrés Almeida, Miryam Gallego, Luis Gerardo Méndez, Camila Selser and José Sefami. ==Other websites== * Category:2013 romantic comedy movies Category:2013 romantic drama movies Category:2013 comedy-drama movies Category:Mexican romance movies Category:Mexican comedy movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies about couples Category:Movies about obesity Category:Movies set in Mexico
title: Paradise (2013 Mexican movie)
